solution_line_template: Hearty bought a total of {num_blue_packages} + {num_red_packages} = <<{num_blue_packages}+{num_red_packages}={total_packages}>>{total_packages} packages.
Therefore, she has a total of {total_packages} x {beads_per_package} = <<{total_packages}*{beads_per_package}={total_beads}>>{total_beads} beads.
